amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-61 to state the sense of Congress that the Secretary of HHS should not take any action to prohibit or restrict "silver loading".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Shalala.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
